attributes.title: It sucked
attributes.review: I got random text over nothing and yes I know we Signed up for this but it doesn’t need to send us messages every five minutes it gets annoying and it’s super lag he and the colors the red white and blue gives me headaches and it kind of gives me like a 3-D version which makes me nauseous

attributes.title: Such a horrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I was excited to be updated and first thing that happens when I open up the app It started glitching my phone. Had to restart my phone completely and still could not get in after. I’m Very upset with this app.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: After downloading the app I got a message saying I can’t access some information simply because I’m a woman!! I was thinking to myself, why would an app withhold information from a person just because they are a woman, then I remember this is an app for the big orange peel in the Oval Office. Ig it’s just sad to see🧚🏻‍♀️💗💖

attributes.title: Made me want to commit sucide
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and saw a horrible and triggering picture. It is disgusting that the PRESIDENT has an app and it has such insensitive pictures that’s can drive someone to sucide. It was a picture of trumps face all yellow and wrinkled. Please get him some plastic surgery if he wants to run again bc his face made me Almost take a bath with a toaster. ☺️

attributes.title: This app gave heart attack 💔
attributes.review: I opened up the app and the most gruesome disturbing image popped up my anxiety ran up my depression kicked in high and that’s where the heart attack almost happened be alert guys as soon as you open this app you will see the most disturbing picture you could ever imagine be careful stay woke

attributes.title: Talking orange
attributes.review: this app is terrible. i have tried it many times but this app does not work. also this app has crashed my phone many times. i also see this ginormous talking orange 🍊 and i mean he is huge, and this is on my screen. i do not appreciate this fat man taking care of our country.

attributes.title: no
attributes.review: I was excited to support out Cheeto president but then the app crashed. so I have to delete bc I don’t have storage but I was excited. me and ✨orange✨ have different political views but I was still gonna support until I was kicked off 😡 so no I don’t recommend. if you’re gonna make a app make it work again 😐✋🏾

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️✨h o r r e n d o u s✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: Hated the app very much! It was the most horrible thing ever creating in all of existence. It unfortunately killed my pet worm 🐛 because of the horrible information it read. It couldn’t bear on to read any longer and pass away from a heart attack on its way to the ER. RIP worma 🐛 we will always remember you😭😭😭. WORMS LIVES MATTER AND WE CANNOT LET A TRAGEDY LIKE THIS EVER HAPPEN AGAIN 😔🙏🏼

attributes.title: tik tok
attributes.review: i am here to say how ya doing 🍊 hope you’re having a horrible day 🥰✨i do not in any circumstance approve of you banning tiktok from the us, lots of creators use that platform to spread awareness and good message, like talk $h!t about you haha anyways i do not recommend this app, not only is it supporting a racist but a ignorant man who believes that people of color don’t have privilege. we are all human beings made from meat and bone, except you of course💕you’re a monster! all blm and all of the people who were brutally murdered and convicted unnecessarily are to be given justice, we stand with them!

This app made my phone start tweaking out. I downloaded it in hopes that I could keep up with my beautiful President’s administration. I just love Donald Trump like no other. But unfortunately, this app blew up my phone. I don’t have phone insurance so now I’m out a few hundred dollars. My biggest regret in life is downloading this app😔
